islock=`echo $result | grep -E "lock /var/run/yum.pid"`

if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi

Vulnerability.Title: qemu-guest-agent bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description: QEMU Guest Agent aims to provide access to a system-level agent via standard QMP commands. This update fixes the following bug: Due to an error in the spec file status, the yum utility incorrectly rewrote the /etc/sysconfig/qemu-ga file when updating the qemu-guest-agent packages. "With this update, the spec file status error has been fixed, and when updating qemu-guest-agent, the original /etc/sysconfig/qemu-ga file remains and the new version is saved under a new name as intended.(BZ#1150924) In addition, this update adds the following enhancement: With this update, qemu-guest-agent has its own component in Red Hat Bugzilla and it is supported in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.1 guest on IBM Power Systems in addition to AMD64 and Intel 64. (BZ#1117096) Users of qemu-guest-agent are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which fix this bug and add this enhancement. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
